name: todoist-context-bridge
description: Bridge your note-taking and task management workflows by maintaining strong contextual connections with Todoist.

scripts.build: npm run prettier && node esbuild.config.mjs production && cp manifest.json build
scripts.preversion: npm run build && npm run test
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && node version-changelog.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json CHANGELOG.md
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && gh release create $npm_package_version -F CHANGELOG.md --draft build/main.js manifest.json

author: wenlzhang
